title: Circa Survive - On Letting Go (2007) FLAC
description:
Circa Survive's second album released by Equal Vision Records on May 29, 2007. Love the album art on this one, the lady character also appears on one of there older albums "Junturna". All the tracks on this torrent are atleast FLAC 24bit/44.1khz Lossless. Your getting 100% of what the artist wanted you to hear vs mp3 format for those who don't know the difference between the two formats, and the perks of FLAC.
